titles.title: A mind at perfect peace with God

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: By nature and by practice far, How very far from God; Yet now by grace brought nigh to Him, Through faith in Jesus’ blood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: So nigh, so very nigh to God, I cannot nearer be; For in the person of His Son I am as near as He.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: So dear, so very dear to God, More dear I cannot be; The love wherewith He loves the Son, Such is His love to me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Why should I ever anxious be, Since such a God is mine? He watches o’er me night and day, And tells me “Mine is thine.”
